content: **knitted jumper for men with raglan in drops nepal piece is knitted top down with cables and stocking stitch size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ne-328 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 550-650-700-750-850-900 g colour 02 off white **knitting gauge** 16 stitches in width and 20 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib drops cable needle - for cables needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
